dmca.title: Religious Book Author Claims Skeptics Posted Book, Sends 512 Notice
dmca.body:
Dear Google,

The following site: http://www.skepticsannotatedbiblecorrected.com is infringing my copyright I have copyrighted my images and text with the U.S. Copyright Office. You are currently showing them in your search engine here: 
http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF8&oe=UTF-8&sa=N&Q=%22skepticsannotatedbiblecorrected%2Bcom%22

I'm the author and publisher of an e-book on CD-ROM. The infringing party has posted my ENTIRE book on his web site; this means graphics as well. I have contacted them, but they have not responded- I have also contacted their registrar and domain host and they are looking into the issue, but have done nothing, yet. I'm strongly considering legal action.

You can verify that this is my book at http://sab.jcsm.org and http://az.jcsm.org. I have three editions and ISBNs for each one.  Furthermore, the U.S. Copyright Office has a copy on file with them as of March 2003.

Please remove your link to http://www.skepticsannotatedbiblecorrected.com and disallow any links to their web pages. They are exposing my book and my book is not free.  Furthermore, they plainly admit on their site that I wrote the book.  They gave me credit in word, but they break the law and post the entire book and my images.

In case you simply want some links Of my images, here you go:

http://www.skepticsannotatedbiblecorrected.com/SAB/SAB.gif, yes
http://www.skepticsannotatedbiblecorrected.com/SAB/CAE.gif, yes
http://www.skepticsannotatedbiblecorrected.com/SAB/OldNew.gif, yes
http://www.skepticsannotatedbiblecorrected.com/SAB/SpecialQuestions.gif, yes
http://www.skepticsannotatedbiblecorrected.com/SAB/Main.gif, yes
http://www.skepticsannotatedbiblecorrected.com/SAB/Daniel.gif, yes

There are about 70 more of my images on their pages.  if you wish to have links to all of them, then I can provide them.

Thanks for your time. A response would be most appreciated. My email is: [Private]@jcsm.org

"I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that, for each image identified above, I either own the copyright or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed."

The infringing party has an email listed as 
[Private]@skepticsannotatedbiblecorrected.com.

Sincerely,
[Private]

Jesus Christ Saves Ministries, http://www.jcsm.org, Over 60,000 web pagesl

John 8:36 reads, "Therefore if the Son makes you free, you shall be free indeed.
